title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
After another rocky outing for Russell Wilson and the Broncos, Colin believes the head coach Nathaniel Hackett is in way over his head. He feels bad for Trey Lance's season ending injury but argues the 49ers are now a better team with Jimmy Garoppolo as their starting quarterback. He tells you why he was right about the Steelers and wrong about the Cowboys. Plus, Super Bowl champion Sean Payton joins the show in studio to talk about game planning against Tom Brady and the issues Wilson is having in Denver.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
